VARIABLES.name: x_monday
VARIABLES.description: Number of employees starting on Monday

VARIABLES.name: x_wednesday
VARIABLES.description: Number of employees starting on Wednesday

VARIABLES.name: x_sunday_monday
VARIABLES.description: Number of employees with both Sunday and Monday off

OBJECTIVE.query: The specific part of extracted_queries used for objective

CONSTRAINTS.description: The difference between the number of employees who start their five-day shift on Monday and those who start on Wednesday must be less than 7.
At least three employees must be assigned to a schedule where they have both Sunday and Monday off consecutively.
